name: bostonian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US city of Boston: It's so nice to meet another Bostonian! The restaurant was popular among young Bostonians.
More examplesFewer examplesThe genial Bostonian was delighted to talk with us.Our tour guide was a native Bostonian and we asked him a lot of questions about the city.The book listed the author simply as "A Bostonian".Soon after, he renewed his acquaintance with a Bostonian named Emily Hale.A dedicated Bostonian, he winces at the mention of the perennially unlucky Red Sox.
